body:
@minux: I can make misc/cgo/test work with gccgo by removing the include of "cgo_export.h" in _cgo_main.c.  It's been there from the start but was never really needed.

I agree that including cgo_export.h is the right way to get a declaration, and I agree that that can't work in a "C" preamble comment, but I think that declaring the function in the "C" comment does work if you get the function signature right.
